summary: Provides utilities to convert OpenAI‑style chat completion requests into the format required by VLLM’s hosted chat endpoint, including a configuration class that maps parameters and supplies provider metadata compatible with the OpenAI API.
business_intent: Allow applications that use the OpenAI chat completion API to seamlessly interact with a hosted VLLM service without code changes, facilitating integration and migration to VLLM while preserving the familiar OpenAI interface.
